Transpose a crosstable

Source: R/pivot.R
transpose_crosstable.Rd

Pivot a crosstable so the label column iw swapped with the by row. This requires the variable column to be the same for every data column, like when all columns are numeric of when all columns are factors with the same levels

Usage

transpose_crosstable(x)

# S3 method for crosstable
t(x)

Arguments

x

a crosstable

Examples

ct = crosstable(mtcars2, c(mpg, drat, wt, qsec), by=am)
t_ct = t(ct)
as_flextable(t_ct)
#> a flextable object.
#> col_keys: `am`, `variable`, `Miles/(US) gallon`, `Rear axle ratio`, `Weight (1000 lbs)`, `1/4 mile time` 
#> header has 2 row(s) 
#> body has 8 row(s) 
#> original dataset sample: 
#>      .id     am   variable Miles/(US) gallon Rear axle ratio Weight (1000 lbs)
#> 1   auto   auto  Min / Max       10.4 / 24.4       2.8 / 3.9         2.5 / 5.4
#> 2   auto   auto  Med [IQR]  17.3 [14.9;19.2]   3.1 [3.1;3.7]     3.5 [3.4;3.8]
#> 3   auto   auto Mean (std)        17.1 (3.8)       3.3 (0.4)         3.8 (0.8)
#> 4   auto   auto     N (NA)            19 (0)          19 (0)            19 (0)
#> 5 manual manual  Min / Max       15.0 / 33.9       3.5 / 4.9         1.5 / 3.6
#>      1/4 mile time
#> 1      15.4 / 22.9
#> 2 17.8 [17.2;19.2]
#> 3       18.2 (1.8)
#> 4           19 (0)
#> 5      14.5 / 19.9
